name: Enchanted Dagger
description: A small dagger enchanted with magical powers.
looks: The dagger has a sleek and silver blade with glowing blue runes engraved on it.

special_effects.energy_steal: Steals a small amount of mana from the target with each hit.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A powerful sword imbued with magical energy.
looks: The sword has a long, silver blade with glowing blue runes etched onto it. The hilt is adorned with gemstones that radiate a soft light.

special_weapon_skills.Sword Mastery: Increases damage and accuracy with swords.

special_effects.Electric Charge: Has a chance to deal additional lightning damage on hit.

name: Enchanted Bow
description: A powerful bow imbued with magical energy.
looks: The bow is made of polished wood and glows with a faint blue light.

special_weapon_skils.archery: Increases accuracy and damage with bows.

special_effects.lightning_bolt: Has a chance to shoot a lightning bolt at the target on a critical hit.

name: Cloak of Invisibility
description: A magical cloak that grants the wearer invisibility.
looks: The cloak is made of a shimmering, translucent fabric that seems to blend seamlessly into the background.

special_effects.Invisibility: The wearer becomes invisible to others, allowing them to move undetected.

name: Strength Potion
description: A potion that temporarily boosts the drinker's strength and melee damage.
looks: The potion is a vibrant red color, swirling with energy.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll that contains the Fireball spell.
looks: The scroll is made of ancient parchment and has a fiery red symbol on it.

special_effects.ignite_target: Fireball has a chance to ignite the target, dealing additional fire damage over time.

name: Fireball Staff
description: A staff that allows the user to cast powerful fireball spells.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood with intricate carvings and a glowing ruby at the top.

special_weapon_skills.spellcasting: Allows the user to cast fireball spells

name: Poisonous Dagger
description: A sharp dagger coated with a potent poison.
looks: The dagger has a dark, serrated blade with a green sheen. The handle is wrapped in worn black leather.

special_weapon_skills.assassination: Increases critical strike chance when using this dagger.

special_effects.poison_on_hit: Has a chance to poison the target on successful hit.

name: Stealthy Dagger
description: A sharp and lightweight dagger that allows for swift and silent attacks.
looks: The dagger has a slender blade with a dark black hue. The handle is wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

special_effects.Stealthy Strikes: Increases damage by 20% when attacking from behind.
